page.title: 15LIFE IN WELLINGBOROUGH TODAY
page.content: Wellingborough offers its people many facilities;a large shopping centre,a transport network comprising bus and rail routes,and different forms of entertainment and leisure.However the citizens share different views on their town.The shopping precinct called the Arndale centre,was built three years ago to meet the demands of an ever increasing population.90% of the shoppers welcomed this but a few thought that it spoilt the image of the town as a market centre. Many commuters think that the transport services are insufficient. There is no proper bus station and the railway station is in need of improve_ ment.Entertainment is provided for both young and old,however,due to the increase in {videos sales}the cinema will be closing down.{Wellingborough {thus caters for the young and old}folk
